alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued September 06 at 11:33PM AKDT until September 07 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 8 inches. * WHERE...Northeastern Brooks Range above 4000 feet. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travels conditions over Atigun Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most areas above 2000 ft can expect another 2 to 4 inches of snow through Thursday afternoon, with the highest amounts above 4000 ft. This is in addition to the 4 inches of snow that has already fallen in Atigun Pass as of 1 PM Wednesday. Snow will taper off in the Brooks Range Thursday afternoon.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
